topic.title: Crisis with America's Constitution
topic.body:
[Is America's Constitution Broken? ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13gLfTixjjktySEGHBMnmrQu4qMJpoRuXw/?Topic:1631107745_1SBoneRDYzA3WAjaanYkhQKWtfkY2ZxCZ/Is+America+s+Constitution+Broken)
It is not broken. However, part of the operation system is outdated. 

The speed of innovation on both technology and virus production is going at so quick a pace that even the most advanced system of Rule of Law seems weak and inefficient. It may be a very lengthy process to prove that the virus comes from lab.

#This itself means that a Bio-weaon war already occurred long time ago, yet many people still wasted months and years of time on the procedures to verify whether the virus comes from lab or derives in nature! 
It sounds absurd!  It's clear that the operation system needs to be updated, so as to better protect the constitution! 
... 
[Crisis and Challenges ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/?Topic:1631096713_1SBoneRDYzA3WAjaanYkhQKWtfkY2ZxCZ/Crisis+and+Challenges)

1623961112_1ASusrn34PQJr8ipd1LcBamudPHxQ.body:
"Adherent", as the author, his opinion is that God is timeless, He also exists complete outside of his creation, outside the concepts of "Time", "Space", and "Science", including any concrete inventions by "Science", including P4 Laboratories producing the virus, and monetized operation of Vaccines Invention and Injection!    
Can anyone imagine what it would be like when atheism jungle dominates the world? 
It'd be
